TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SystemColors extends System.Object
public ref class SystemColors abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemColors extends System.Object

summary.span: 类的每个属性都是 结构，这种结构是 Windows 显示元素的颜色。

span.span: Each property of the class is a structure that is the color of a Windows display element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用或类的属性， 而不是基于中的值来创建新的笔或画笔，从而提高性能 。Better performance is achieved by using the properties of the or classes rather than creating a new pen or brush based on a value from . 例如，如果想要获取三维元素的面部颜色的画笔，请使用 属性，因为它将获取已存在的画笔，而调用 具有参数值的构造函数 将创建一个新的画笔。For example, if you wanted to get a brush for the face color of a 3-D element, use the property because it gets a brush that already exists, whereas calling the constructor with a parameter value of will create a new brush. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 运算符和 类。The following code example demonstrates the operator and the class. 此示例旨在与包含名为的按钮的 Windows 窗体一起使用 `Button1` 。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a button named `Button1`. 将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并将该 `Button1_Click` 方法与按钮的 `Click` 事件关联。Paste the following code into your form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's `Click` event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ActiveBorder As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ActiveBorder { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示活动窗口边框的颜色的 结构。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the active window's border.

value.span: 一个 ，它是活动窗口边框的颜色。

span.span: A that is the color of the active window's border.

value.span: 一个 ，它是活动窗口标题栏的颜色。

span.span: A that is the color of the active window's title bar.

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.

value.span: 一个 ，它是活动窗口标题栏中文本的颜色。

span.span: A that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.

public: static property System::Drawing::Color AppWorkspace { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 获取 结构，它是应用程序工作区的颜色。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the application workspace.

value.span: 一个 ，它是应用程序工作区的颜色。

span.span: A that is the color of the application workspace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序工作区是多文档视图中未被文档占据的区域。The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonFace As Color

summary.span: 获取 结构，它是三维元素的表面颜色。

span.span: A that is the face color of a 3-D element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonHighlight As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ButtonHighlight { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 获取 结构，它是三维元素的突出显示颜色。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

value.span: ，它是三维元素的高光点颜色。

span.span: A that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此颜色应用于三维元素面向光源的部分。This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ButtonShadow As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color ButtonShadow { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

span.span: Gets a structure that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.

value.span: ，它是三维元素的阴影颜色。

span.span: A that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此颜色应用于三维元素背向光源的部分。This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Highlight As Color
public: static property System::Drawing::Color Highlight { System::Drawing::Color get(); };

summary.span: 获取 结构，它是选定项的背景色。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the background of selected items.

value.span: 一个 ，它是选定项的背景的颜色。

span.span: A that is the color of the background of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选定的项可能包含菜单项和选定文本。Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. 例如，该 结构可以是用于列表框中选定项的背景的颜色。For example, the structure may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.

span.span: A that is the color of the text of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，此颜色用于列表框中选定项的文本。For example, this color is used for the text of selected items in a list box.

span.span: A that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击一个热跟踪项会执行该项。Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.
